content: the knot mesh top is a reversible mesh top perfect for those sunny days or a night out with friends the best part is it s beginner-friendly and works up quickly making it an ideal project for those new to crochet or anyone looking for a relaxing yet rewarding design the top has a unique reversible design giving you the flexibility to switch up your look you ll love the texture the breathability and how comfortable it feels to wear i m totally obsessed with it and it has become my go-to outfit whenever i m at craft fairs and festivals as a vendor if you re a visual learner you ll find an in-depth video tutorial 1 on my youtube channel it complements the written instructions and demonstrates each stitch and technique used in the pattern the pattern includes useful guidelines and stitch count suggestions to guarantee an ideal fit yet it can also be customized to your specific measurements allowing you to adjust the length and width according to your preferences i designed it to be suitable for everyone no matter what size gender and body shape however it is true that each body is different and there may be variations in how the pattern fits from person to person skill level beginner supplies needed - hook 5 mm or corresponding hook to meet the gauge swatch - between 150 and 500 yards of #4 medium weight yarn - for size s i ve used 2 skeins 100 gr/3 5 oz/210 m/230 yards of hobbii friends 8/6 from hobbii in colourway 124 black and 14 caramel for suitable yarn substitution click here 2 - scissors - tape measure - yarn needle - stitch markers the pattern has pictures to clarify the written instructions ****this design has been tested by people with different bodies and bra cups from size s to size xxl**** if you like the bra i m wearing underneath you should totally check out organic basics awesome products this bra is made of 100% organic tencel™ and i seriously wear it all the time they ve got underwear activewear and essentials all ethically made in europe with organic cotton tencel™ and recycled materials super cool sustainable fashion you can get a 10% discount on your entire order by using this link 3 or entering the code marinarusso at checkout ps i ve created the design from start to end so please don t copy that by purchasing you agree not to distribute the pattern in any way for free or for sale if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished products as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer on your social media and provide a link to my shop if you re selling online if you have any doubts or questions feel free to contact me check out my website for free patterns https //bloodimaryart com or follow me here →
